about_the_game: This soundtrack consists of 17 tracks and over an hour of music in total. Different variations of one track are summed up in one audio file. This is why "Increasing Insanity", for example, with its eight different variations, is over 12 minutes long.
detailed_description: This soundtrack consists of 17 tracks and over an hour of music in total. Different variations of one track are summed up in one audio file. This is why "Increasing Insanity", for example, with its eight different variations, is over 12 minutes long.
name: Mycorrhiza Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 115 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 630 MB available space

short_description: Mycorrhiza's soundtrack featuring 17 tracks and over one hour of music in total.
